name: Asian Turkey Lettuce Wraps
author: Dole
summary: Ground turkey, cucumber, and mint are flavored with Thai peanut sauce in these quick and easy wraps.
ingredients: 1 cup bottled Thai peanut satay sauce, divided
¼ cup coarsely chopped fresh mint
directions: Saute onion in peanut oil in large skillet over medium-high heat 3 to 5 minutes or until onion starts to soften
Add turkey and saute 7 to 8 minutes or until cooked through
Stir in 1/2 cup satay sauce, 1 tablespoon soy sauce and hoisin sauce
Add cucumber and chopped mint; heat until hot
Whisk together remaining 1/2 cup satay sauce and 1 tablespoon soy sauce in small bowl
Assemble each wrap by spooning about 3/4 cup turkey mixture on each tortilla and topping with salad and mint leaves if desired
Fold in sides of tortilla and roll up
Cut in half and serve with satay soy sauce mixture
